description.full: Single Player, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition), Xbox Live Vision Camera Required. The Ptolmec tribe needs your help! Guide Pterry the Pturtle through his jungle home. Use your Xbox Live™ Vision camera to navigate across islands, over bridges, and through ancient ruins. Your goal: collect the missing musical totems and bring the music back to the Ptolmec Pinball Party! Try TotemBall today. Download the full game now for FREE! This title requires Xbox Live Vision Camera. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: The ancient Ptolmec tribe composed innovative music. When they simultaneously discovered gunpowder and barbeque, the explosive results scattered their musical totems across the jungle! Now Pterry the Pturtle must roll across mountains, islands, bridges, and giant pinball games to retrieve the lost totems and bring music back to the party. Using your Xbox Live™ Vision camera, help Pterry uncover all the musical totems while grooving your own "totem" beat.
